name: timeboxed-config
description: configuration page for the timeboxed watchface

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist/ && rm -rf node_modules/ && rm -rf deploy/
scripts.deploy: mkdir -p deploy/dist/ && cp -R server/* deploy/ && cp -R dist/* deploy/dist/
scripts.build:deploy: npm run build:config_page && mkdir -p deploy/dist/ && cp -R server/* deploy/ && cp -R dist/* deploy/dist/
scripts.build:deploy:start: npm run build:deploy && (cd deploy && npm install && npm run start)
